about_the_game:
Crux: The Great Outdoors is a rock climbing game in which you move your climber’s hands and feet from hold to hold - but each hold will only let you hang on for so long.



Unique time-based puzzle mechanic: Change your body position by moving hands or feet to a new hold - the hand hold determines how much time you have to move before falling off.

Plan ahead and execute: You'll need to think ahead and execute flawlessly to beat all levels in the least amount of moves.

Enjoy the Great Outdoors: Solve over 70 climbing challenges in nine peaceful and beautiful landscapes, from Caribbean coastline to rugged Highlands and red canyon walls.

reviews:
“Crux is a game well worth your time and even as someone who doesn’t do actual rock climbing myself the whole thing is incredibly enjoyable both from a thematic aspect and as a really solid puzzle game.”
TouchArcade

“A sequel to possibly the finest climbing puzzler ever created. Clamber over handholds and footholds to reach the top of a series of routes in the great outdoors. It takes a while to get used to the controls, but when it clicks this is a thing of beauty.”
Droid Gamers
short_description: Solve grid-based climbing challenges in this unique time-based puzzler. Figure out the right sequence to move your hands and feet and execute it flawlessly - or you will fall!
